os_service.description: Setup appropriate operating system job to start WebSphere at system startup
os_service.displayname: Enable automatic starting of WebSphere servers

use_default_certs.description: Use WebSphere default certificates when creating profiles
use_default_certs.displayname: Create a new default personal certificate

dmgr_host_name.description: The fully qualified domain name of the deployment manager to federate this node to

base.description: WebSphere Application Server will be installed and configured

nd.description: WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment will be installed and configured

core.feature.description: Indicates that the application server feature (core.feature) should be installed

ejbdeploy.description: Indicates whether the optional feature EJBDeploy tool for pre-EJB 3.0 modules should be installed

embeddablecontainer.description: Indicates whether the embeddable EJB container should be installed
embeddablecontainer.displayname: Install optional Embeddable EJB Container feature

liberty.description: Indicates whether the WebSphere Liberty Application Server should be installed. Used for WebSphere installations that bundled Liberty as an install option

samples.description: Indicates whether the PlantsByWebSphere sample application should be installed

thinclient.description: Indicates whether the optional IBM stand-alone thin clients and resource adapters should be installed
thinclient.displayname: Install optional stand-alone thin clients and resource adapters

ihs_host_name.description: Fully qualified domain name of the IBM HTTP server

install_dir.description: The installation root directory for the WebSphere Application Server roduct binaries

enable.description: Installation Manager response file option to install Java 8 SDK. Valid only for WebSphere V9

offering_id.description: Java SDK installation manager offering ID value
offering_id.displayname: Java 8 SDK installation manager offering id

java_version.description: The Java 8 SDK version that should be installed with the WebSphere Application Server. Example format is 8.0.4.70

os_perms.description: File permissions for the WebSphere installation

comment.description: Comment that will be added when creating the userid

gid.description: Operating System group name that will be assigned to the product installation

home.description: Home directory location for operating system user that is used for product installation
home.displayname: WebSphere System Installation Userid Home Directory

ldap_user.description: Use LDAP to authenticate operating system account on Linux logins

name.description: Operating system userid that will be used to install the product. Userid will be created if it does not exist

shell.description: Default shell for the operating system userid

profile_dir.description: The directory path that contains WebSphere Application Server profiles

cell.description: A cell name is a logical name for the group of nodes administered by the deployment manager cell

host.description: A host name is the domain name system (DNS) name (short or long) or the IP address of this virtual machine and cannot contain an understore (_)

keystorepassword.description: Specifies the password to use on keystore created during profile creation

node.description: A node name is for administration by the deployment manager.  The name must be unique within the cell

personalcertdn.description: Specifies the distinguished name of the personal certificate that you are creating when you create the profile

personalcertvalidityperiod.description: An optional parameter that specifies the amount of time in years that the default personal certificate is valid
personalcertvalidityperiod.displayname: Personal certificate expiration period in years

CELL_DISCOVERY_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager Cell Discovery Address port value (CELL_DISCOVERY_ADDRESS)

CSIV2_SSL_MUTUALAUTH_LISTENER_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager CSIV2 Client Authentication Listener Port (CSIV2_SSL_MUTUALAUTH_LISTENER_ADDRESS)

CSIV2_SSL_SERVERAUTH_LISTENER_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager CSIV2 Server Authentication Listener Port (CSIV2_SSL_SERVERAUTH_LISTENER_ADDRESS) port value

DCS_UNICAST_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager High Availability Manager Communication Port (DCS_UNICAST_ADDRESS)

DataPowerMgr_inbound_secure.description: Deployment manager DataPower Appliance Manager Secure Inbound Port (DataPowerMgr_inbound_secure)
DataPowerMgr_inbound_secure.displayname: DataPower Appliance Manager Secure Inbound Port

IPC_CONNECTOR_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager IPC Connector Port value (IPC_CONNECTOR_ADDRESS)

OVERLAY_TCP_LISTENER_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager Administration Overlay TCP Port (OVERLAY_TCP_LISTENER_ADDRESS)

OVERLAY_UDP_LISTENER_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager Administration Overlay UDP Port (OVERLAY_UDP_LISTENER_ADDRESS)

SOAP_CONNECTOR_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager SOAP connector port value (SOAP_CONNECTOR_ADDRESS)

STATUS_LISTENER_ADDRESS.description: Deployment manager Status Update Listener Port (STATUS_LISTENER_ADDRESS)

WC_adminhost_secure.description: Deployment manager adminsitrative secure console port (WC_adminhost_secure)

XDAGENT_PORT.description: Deployment manager Middleware Agent RPC port (XDAGENT_PORT)

signingcertdn.description: Specifies the distinguished name of the root signing certificate that you create when you create the profile

signingcertvalidityperiod.description: An optional parameter that specifies the amount of time in years that the root signing certificate is valid
signingcertvalidityperiod.displayname: Root signing certificate expiration period in years

node.description: Node name is for administration and must be unique

admin_user.description: The username for securing the WebSphere adminstrative console

admin_user_pwd.description: The password for the WebSphere administrative account

host_name.description: The host name or ipaddress of the unmanaged host

node_name.description: Node name for the unmanaged node

os.description: Indicates the operating system type for the unmanaged node

version.description: The release and fixpack level of WebSphere Application Server to be installed. Example formats are 8.5.5.11 or 9.0.0.4

admin_port.description: IBM HTTP administrative server port.  Used for creating the web server definition

ihs_admin_password.description: IBM HTTP administrative username password. Used for creating the web server definition

ihs_admin_user.description: IBM HTTP administrative username. Used for creating the web server definition

install_dir.description: Specify the HTTP Server installation directory. Used for creating the web server definition

plugin_dir.description: Specify the webserver plugin directory. Used for creating the web server definition

webapp_mapping.description: Indicate how the applications should be mapped from the webserver
webapp_mapping.displayname: Map all applications to the webserver

webserver_port.description: HTTP Server listener port that will receive requests on. Use for creating the web server definition

cluster_name.description: Name of the cluster that will be created

server_name.description: Name of the cluster member that will created on each of the nodes

node_name.description: Node for the deployment manager that will be updated

profile_path.description: Directoy where the deployment manager profile resides

property_value_initial.displayname: Deployment manager minimum JVM Heap Size

property_value_maximum.displayname: Deployment manager maximum JVM Heap Size

server_name.description: Name of server that will be updated for JVM heap size

property_value_maximum.displayname: Node agent maximum JVM heap size
